name: terminus white on black for openbsd man pages
description:
Make online OpenBSD man pages readable.
Fixed font (you will need the terminus fonts installed or change it to another one).
Black background white text. Different colors for italics and bold text.

Based on style 681 by user 30
additional_info:
On Tue, 01 Nov 2011 21:45:21 +0100
 updated for newer firefox releases (small fix)
